name: Ant Control Picnic War Takeover Free Version: Crazy Bugs Gone Wild!
name_original: Ant Control Picnic War Takeover Free Version: Crazy Bugs Gone Wild!
description:
These Ants have gone crazy! They are on a mission to eat all the food! Help get the ants to the food so they can eat more. Be careful though, these ants are angry and don't like it when another ant tries to eat their food. Don't let the ants touch each other or they will fight and it's game over!

You can also help the ants defend their food by smashing and crushing the other bugs. Fun sounds, multiple environments, addicting game play, and fun for all! Get this one completely FREE today!
